conversations.flag.dialog.required.field.icon=* conversations.flag.dialog.instruction2.txt=I am flagging this comment because it conversations.flag.dialog.instruction3.txt=Enter a note (no more than 300 characters) describing what makes this comment objectionable: conversations.flag.dialog.cancel.btt=Cancel conversations.flag.dialog.submit.btt=Submit ## REASONS FOR FLAGGING - USE IN FLAG DIALOG ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_=Selectionnez ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_0=Promotes hate or violence ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_1=Displays pornography ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_2=Is empty or blank ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_3=Is obviously commercial in nature, without clear educational relevance ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_4=Is broken or has a virus ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_5=Appears to be nonsensical ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_6=Is objectionable for another reason ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_7=Autre raison ## FLAG SUCCESS MESSAGE conversations.flag.success.dialog.header=Discussion Flagged conversations.flag.success.dialog.message=You have successfully flagged this comment. conversations.flag.success.dialog.button=Close ## FLAG livetable conversations.flag.reason=Reason conversations.flag.user=User conversations.flag.doc.creationDate=Date conversations.flag.message=Message conversations.flag.moderator=Moderator conversations.flag.status=Status conversations.flag.target=Target conversations.flag.emptyvalue=- conversations.flag.list.title=Flag List conversations.flag.list.instructions=This is the list of flagged items conversations.flag.success.dialog.goback=Return to discussion conversations.addthis.title={0} #xwikiforum conversations.addthis.desc={0} ## most active discussions discussion.panel.title=Topic Actifs discussion.panel.sortby=Tri: discussion.panel.dates=Date discussion.panel.votes=Votes discussion.panel.comments=Commentaires discussion.panel.topics=Topics ## rights conversation.groups.norights=Vous devez être membre de ce groupe pour participer à la discussion.
